title: Akali's (W) shroud -  visual Bug
body:
After this update, idk if its just me or anyone else but akali's w isn't forming a ring anymore, it's appearing as blobs of shrouds floating very fast across the map and not where the w is casted. The normal ring itself is not visible making it very hard to clearly know where the shroud lies and grows. the parts of her shroud disappear  and reappear all over the lane aswell, disappears when w is finished.

Please help.

replies.body:
It sounds like it's probably a local file issue.

Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
